summary:
This retextures the spray effect when waves hit the shore and adds foam to the wave water. Dragon Born DLC is required.

available in x256, x512, x1024 and x2048 sized textures
descriptionHtml:
This retextures the spray effect when waves hit the shore and adds foam to the wave water. Dragon Born DLC is required, I don't know if it is needed when using W.A.T.E.R. or Realistic Water 2.

I didn't like the vanilla effect of the water spray, I personally think it looks unreal and tacky and totally out of place compared to the surrounding environment. So I went about seeing if I could make them look more natural and this is the result I came up with.

available in x256, x512, x1024 and x2048 sized textures

COMPATIBILITY
This will over write the wave textures found in W.A.T.E.R. and Realistic Water 2. In the optional section I have added the meshes used by these mods, should you want their wave textures to be displayed along with this mod's spray effect.

HISTORY
version 1.0: initial release.


Another brilliant video from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2388835][u][color=#0066cc]hodilton[/color][/u][/url] thanks very much.
[youtube]JFlARk9o6kQ[/youtube]

Many thanks to [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/11654708-vatiwah/][u][color=#0066cc]vatiwah[/color][/u][/url] for including this in his brilliantly extertaining review.
[youtube]0_4gn1abeYg[/youtube]
